mapper.insert: insert into dept(name, parent_id,remark, operator, operator_time) value(#{name}, #{parentId}, #{remark}, #{operator}, #{operatorTime})
mapper.update: update dept set name = #{name}, parent_id = #{parentId}, remark = #{remark}, operator = #{operator}, operator_time = #{operatorTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from dept where parent_id = #{deptId}
